name: Black Blade
effect:
Caster creates an illusory black blade, then leaps forward to
 deliver a spinning slash that emits a wave of light.
 
 This can be followed up with one additional attack.
 
 This blade was once imbued with Destined Death. In addition to
 dealing damage, it reduces foes' maximum HP and continues to
 sap their current HP for a very short time.

name: Bloodboon
effect: Scatters bloodflame before caster to set area aflame.

name: Burn O Flame!
effect: Raises a series of flame pillars around the caster.Charging further increases the number offlame pillars.

name: Carian Retaliation
effect: Swing your staff to dispel incoming sorceries and incantations, using their power to retaliate with glintblades.

name: Comet Azur
effect:
Fires a tremendous comet in a torrent akin to the distant starry expanse, the place said to be the origin of glintstone.
Hold to continue releasing the sorcery's power.

name: Death Lightning
effect: Strikes surroundings with storm of death lightning

name: Elden Stars
effect: Creates a steam of golden shooting stars that assail the area.

name: Eternal Darkness
effect: Creates a dark space that draws in spells

name: Flame Fortification
effect: Increases fire damage negation.

name: Fortissax's Lightning Spear
effect: Stabs from above with two red lightning spears in tandem

name: Golden Vow
effect:
Increases attack power and defense for the caster and nearby allies.
Hold to continue praying and delay activation.

name: Placidusax's Ruin
effect: Spews golden breath of Dragonlord Placidusax

name: Protection of the Erdtree
effect:
Increase damage negation for all affinities except physical, for both the caster and nearby allies.
Hold to continue praying and delay activation.

name: Ranni's Dark Moon
effect: Uses the caster as a vessel to incarnate a cold, dark moon, then sends it floating toward foes. The dark moon dispels all sorcery that touches it,  and temporarily reduces magic damage negation for those it strikes.

name: Rennala's Full Moon
effect: Uses the caster as a vessel to incarnate a full moon, then sends it floating toward foes. The full moon dispels all sorcery that touches it, and temporarily reduces magic damage negation for those it strikes.

name: Rykard's Rancor
effect: Summons searign spirits that leave a trail of delayed explosions in their wake.

name: Scarlet Aeonia
effect: Creates a giant flower that explodes with scarlet rot.

name: The Flame of Frenzy
effect:
Causes the yellow flame of frenzy to burst forth from the caster's eyes.
Charging increases the range of the burst.

name: Agheel's Flame
effect:
Transforms caster into a dragon to spew flaming breath from
above.
Charging extends duration. This incantation can be used while jumping.

name: Ambush Shard
effect:
Launches a projectile from a distance removed from the caster, so as to strike the enemy from behind.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly.

name: Assassin's Approach
effect: Completely silences the footsteps of the caster. Additionally reduces fall damage and the sound produced by falling. This sorcery can be cast while in motion or crouching.

name: Divine Fortification
effect:
Increases holy damage negation.
This incantation can be cast while in motion.

name: Dragonfire
effect: Transforms caster into a dragon to spew flaming breath. Charging extends duration.

name: Ekzykes's Decay
effect:
Transforms caster into a dragon to spew scarlet rot breath from
above.
Charging extends duration. This incantation can be cast while jumping.

name: Electrify Armament
effect: Enchants armament held in the right hand with lightning-affinity attacks.

name: Flame Grant me Strength
effect: Raises physical and fire-affinity attack power

name: Flame Protect Me
effect: Creates a fire within that greatly increases fire damage negation.

name: Frozen Armament
effect:
Enchants armament held in the right hand with frost.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion.

name: Glintstone Arc
effect:
Fires a horizontal arc of magic that spreads outward.
This sorcery can be cast repeteadly and while in motion.

name: Gravity Well
effect:
Fires a projectile of condensed gravitational force. Those struck by it will be pulled toward the caster.
Charging enhances potency.

name: Great Heal
effect: Greatly Heals HP for self and nearby allies

name: Lansseax's Glaive
effect: Creates a red-lightning glaive and sweeps the area from above. This attack unleashes trails of lightning.

name: Law of Regression
effect: Heals all ailments and dispels all special effects

name: Lightning Spear
effect:
Summons a lightning spear and hurls it before the caster.
 
 Charging causes a lightning bolt to strike the point of impact

name: Litany of Proper Death
effect:
Creates an image of Order, dealing holy damage to nearby foes.
This incantation is especially damaging to Those Who Live in Death. Any felled by this incantation cannot be revived.

name: Lord's Aid
effect:
Alleviates buildup of poison, blood loss, and sleep for the caster
and nearby allies. Additionally, cures poison.Hold to continue praying and delay activation.

name: Loretta's Greatbow
effect:
Creates a magic greatbow and fires a great arrow.
Charging enhances potency. Hold to keep the great arrow nocked.

name: Magic Glintblade
effect:
Creates a sigil overhead, from which an enemy-seeking glintblade appears after a brief delay.
This sorcery can be used while in motion. Charging increases the delay.

name: Order's Blade
effect: Enchants armament held in the right hand with holy-affinity attacks. This incantation is especially damaging to Those Who Live in Death. Any felled by this incantation cannot be revived.

name: Terra Magicus
effect: Draws an academy sigil upon the ground, raising the magic strength of those within.

name: Theodorix's Magma
effect: Spews magma breath of Theodorix from above

name: Unseen Blade
effect:
Enchants armament held in right hand, making it completely invisible.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion.

name: Urgent Heal
effect:
Heals a small amount of HP.
This incantation can be cast while in motion.

name: Vyke's Dragonbolt
effect: Enchants right-hand armament with lightning damage

name: Whirl O Flame!
effect: Sweeps area before caster with stream of fire

name: Wrath of Gold
effect:
Produces a golden shockwave that knocks back nearby foes.
Charging increases the size of the shockwave.

name: Barrier of Gold
effect:
Greatly increases magic damage negation for the caster and nearby allies.
Hold to continue praying and delay activation.

name: Bestial Constitution
effect: Alleviates blood loss and frost buildup

name: Black Flame
effect: Throws a ball of raging black fire

name: Black Flame Blade
effect: Enchants right-hand armament with black flame

name: Black Flame Ritual
effect: Summons a circle of black flame pillars around the caster. Charging increases the size of the circle.

name: Bloodflame Blade
effect:
Engulfs armament held in the right hand with bloodflame.
This incantation can be cast while in motion.After dealing damage, bloodflame continues to build up onset of blood loss for a very short time.

name: Borealis's Mist
effect:
Transforms caster into a dragon to spew icy breath from above.
Charging extends duration. This incantation can be cast while
jumping.

name: Carian Phalanx
effect:
Creates a defensive arch of numerous magic glintblades overhead, which automatically attack nearby foes.
This sorcery can be used cast while in motion.

name: Carian Slicer
effect:
Conjures a magic sword and delivers a swift sweeping slash.
This sorcery can be used without delay after performing another
action.

name: Comet
effect: Fires a great magic comet

name: Dragonice
effect:
Transforms caster into a dragon to spew icy breath.
Charging extends duration.

name: Flame Cleanse Me
effect: Creates a fire within that burns away toxins. Alleviates poison and scarlet rot buildup and cures these ailments.

name: Founding Rain of Stars
effect:
Summons a dark cloud ofstars overhead. Shortly after, the cloud
will release a violent deluge of star rain. This sorcery can be cast
while in motion. Charging increases potency.

name: Glintblade Phalanx
effect:
Creates a defensive arch of magic glintblades overhead, which
automatically attack nearby foes.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion.

name: Glintstone Icecrag
effect:
The glintstone serves as a conduit, launching a mass of cold magic.
 This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion.

name: Glintstone Pebble
effect:
The glintstone serves as a conduit, launching magical projectiles at foes.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion.

name: Golden Lightning Fortification
effect: Greatly increases lightning resistance for self and allies

name: Great Glintstone Shard
effect:
The glintstone serves as a conduit, launching large magical projectiles at foes.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion.

name: Gurranq's Beast Claw
effect: Creates beast claws to rend surroundings with shockwaves

name: Howl of Shabriri
effect: Shrieks, building up madness in nearby foes

name: Immutable Shield
effect: Increases left-hand shield's affinity/ailment resistance

name: Law of Causality
effect:
Manifests a small ring of causality within that allows the caster to
automatically retaliate upon receiving a certain number of blows.

name: Lightning Fortification
effect: Increass lighting damage negation

name: Lightning Strike
effect:
Summons a bolt of lightning that scatters and spreads around the surrounding area.
This incantation can be cast repeatedly.

name: Lord's Divine Fortification
effect:
Greatly increases holy damage negation for the caster and nearby
allies.Hold to continue praying and delay activation.

name: Lord's Heal
effect:
Heals a massive amount of HP for the caster and nearby allies.
Hold to continue praying and delay activation.

name: Magic Fortification
effect: Increases magic damage negation

name: Meteorite of Astel
effect: Calls a hail of small meteorites from the void.

name: Rotten Breath
effect:
Transforms caster into a dragon to spew scarlet rot breath.
Charging extends duration.

name: Scholar's Armament
effect:
Enchants armaments held in the right hand with magic-affinity attacks.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion.

name: Smarag's Glintstone Breath
effect: Spews magic breath of Glintstone Dragon Smarag from above

name: Star Shower
effect:
Fires six magic shooting stars that pursue the target.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging enhances potency.

name: Stone of Gurranq
effect: Hurls a boulder before the caster

name: Surge O Flame!
effect:
Creates a stream of fire to burn the area before the caster.
This incantation can be cast while in motion. Hold to maintain
the effect.

name: Swift Glintstone Shard
effect:
The glintstone serves as a conduit, launching swift magical projectiles at foes.
This sorcery can be used without delay after performing another action.

name: Blessing of the Erdtree
effect: Grants a greater blessing to the caster and nearby allies, gradually restoring a large amount of HP. Hold to continue  praying and delay activation.

name: Crystal Release
effect: Creates a mass of crystal, then shatters it to scour a wide area with a violent rain of crystal shards.

name: Crystal Torrent
effect: Creates crystal mass that fires stream of crystal shards

name: Cure Poison
effect:
Cures the poison status ailment and reduces poison gauge build-up.
This incantation can be cast while in motion.

name: Erdtree Heal
effect:
Heals a vast amount of HP for the caster and nearby allies.
 
 Hold to continue praying and delay activation.

name: Explosive Ghostflame
effect: Causes ghostflame explosion that burns wide area

name: Flame of the Fell God
effect:
Releases a ball of raging fire said to be inhabited by a fell god. The
fireball floats toward enemies and explodes, setting the area
ablaze.

name: Glintstone Cometshard
effect:
Fires a magical comet with a trailing tail.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. Charging enhances potency.

name: Glintstone Stars
effect:
Fires three magic shooting stars that pursue the target.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging enhances
potency.

name: Greyoll's Roar
effect: Transforms caster into a dragon to emit a terrible roar, reducing the attack power and defense of nearby enemies.

name: Heal
effect:
Heals HP for the caster and nearby allies.
Hold to continue praying and delay activation.

name: Loretta's Mastery
effect: Fires four great arrow from a magic greatbow at once

name: Lucidity
effect: Alleviates buildup of sleep and madness.This sorcery can be cast while in motion.

name: Magma Breath
effect: Channels wyrm to spew magma breath

name: Scholar's Shield
effect:
Enchants shield held in the left hand with additional damage negation.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion.

name: Stars of Ruin
effect: Fire twelve dark shooting stars that pursue foes

name: Unseen Form
effect:
Makes the caster semi-invisible.
While on horseback, effect extends to cover the mount.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion.

name: Ancient Death Rancor
effect: Summons horde of vengeful spirits that chase down foes

name: Blessing's Boon
effect:
Grants a blessing to the caster and nearby allies, gradually restoring HP.
Hold to continue praying and delay activation.

name: Bloodflame Talons
effect: Creates bloodflame lacerations that then explode

name: Collapsing Stars
effect: Fires numerous gravitational projectiles. Any foes struck will be pulled toward the caster. Charging enhances potency.

name: Crystal Barrage
effect:
Fires a volley of glintstone crystal shards.
Charging increases potency.

name: Darkness
effect:
Creates a veil of darkness that conceals the caster.
This incantation can be cast while in motion or crouching.

name: Discus of Light
effect: Fires ring of light before the caster

name: Dragonbolt Blessing
effect:
Summons lightning to bolster the caster's body. Attacks become easier to deflect and resistance to all ailments is increased.
However, lightning damage negation will be reduced.

name: Dragonclaw
effect: Transformn caster into a dragon to tear through foes with dragon claws. Allows one follow-up attack.

name: Fire's Deadly Sin
effect: Sets area and self ablaze with raging flames

name: Freezing Mist
effect:
Releases a cold mist before the caster.
 This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging enhances range of the mist.

name: Frozen Lightning Spear
effect:
Creates a spear of ice lightning and stabs it into the ground from
above. On impact, the spear will burst into trails of lightning advancing forwards.

name: Magic Downpour
effect:
Summons a mass of magic that fires projectiles over a wide area.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion. Charging extends
duration.

name: Night Comet
effect: Fires semi-invisible magic comet

name: Night Maiden's Mist
effect:
Releases a life-sapping silver mist before the caster, dealing
damage to all caught within, including the caster.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion

name: Pest Threads
effect: Launches countless sticky threads before caster

name: Poison Armament
effect: Enchants armament held in the right hand with poison

name: Shadow Bait
effect:
Creates a pale gold shadow before the caster, luring foes of human
build and attracting their aggression.This incantation can be cast while in motion or crouching, and
will still affect foes that are already in a combat state.

name: Shattering Crystal
effect: Creates crystal mass that shatters in forward burst

name: Thops's Barrier
effect:
Creates a magic forcefield that deflects sorceries and incantations.
Hold to continuously create barriers.

name: Triple Rings of Light
effect: Fire three rings of light before the caster

name: Zamor Ice Storm
effect: Thrust staff into ground to create freezing tornado

name: Adula's Moonblade
effect:
Conjures a cold magic greatsword, then delivers a sweeping blow
that launches a blade-like projectile of frost.

name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Spear
effect:
Creates a spear of red lightning and stabs it into the ground from
 above. On impact, the spear will burst into trails of lightning
 covering the area.

name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Strike
effect:
Summons a red bolt of lightning that scatters and spreads around
the surrounding area.Charging enhances the range of the lightning bolt.

name: Aspect of the Crucible Breath
effect: Creates throat pouch to spew fire while walking

name: Aspect of the Crucible Tail
effect:
Creates a supple tail that sweeps through foes before the caster.
Charging enhances potency.

name: Aspects of the Crucible Horns
effect: creates shoulder horn to gore foes from a low stance.

name: Black Flame's Protection
effect:
Summons black fire within, increasing physical damage negation.
However, sacred flasks and other such forms of HP restoration are
impaired.

name: Cannon of Haima
effect:
Lobs an explosive magic projectile that flies in an arc.
Charging enhances potency.

name: Carian Piercer
effect:
Conjures a magic greatsword to impale foes.
Charging lengthens the initial step in.

name: Flame Fall Upon Them
effect: Hurls several balls offire at once.Charging enhances potency and causes the balls offire to explode.

name: Gavel of Haima
effect:
Creates a magical greathammer and slams it down.
Allows one follow-up attack.

name: Gelmir's Fury
effect:
Conjures a surge of magma from the earth, covering the area.
Charging extends the surge of magma.

name: Giantsflame Take Thee
effect: Hurls a massive ball of raging fire.Charging enhances potency and causes the ball offire to explode.

name: Glintstone Breath
effect:
Transforms caster into a dragon to spew magic breath.
Charging extends duration.

name: Great Oracular Bubble
effect:
Produces a gigantic magical bubble that drifts towards foes before it naturally ruptures.
Charging increases the delay before the bubble pops.

name: Greatblade Phalanx
effect: Creates a defensive arch of larger magic glintblades overhead, which automatically attack nearby foes.

name: Meteorite
effect:
Calls small meteorites down from the sky.
 The meteor shower continues for as long as the sorcery is in effect

name: Noble Presence
effect: Thrust out belly with gusto to unelash repelling shockwave

name: Order Healing
effect: Alleviates death blight buildup

name: Radagon's Rings of Light
effect: Creates golden ring of light to attack wide area

name: Scouring Black Flame
effect:
Sweeps a wide area before the caster with black flame.
Charging enhances range.

name: Shard Spiral
effect: Fire twin spiraling projectiles

name: Tibia's Summons
effect:
Summons a group of Those Lost in Death.
Three skeletons will appear some distance from the caster and attack foes before disappearing.

name: Unendurable Frenzy
effect: Emits violent burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes.

name: Beast Claw
effect:
Creates beast claws that rend the land with shockwaves.
Charging enhances potency.

name: Bestial Sling
effect:
Swiftly flings a number of sharp rock shards.
This incantation can be cast without delay after performing another action.

name: Bestial Vitality
effect: Heals HP over a period of time

name: Briars of Punishment
effect: Wounds caster to unleash trail of bloodthrorns

name: Briars of Sin
effect: Summons thorns from a whorl of your own blood.

name: Carian Greatsword
effect:
Conjures a magic greatsword and then delivers a sweeping blow.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly.

name: Catch Flame
effect:
Momentarily sparks flame from the caster's hand.
This incantation can be cast without delay after performing another action.

name: Crystal Burst
effect:
Fires a burst of glintstone crystal shards.
This sorcery can be cast repeatedly and while in motion. Charging increases potency.

name: Dragonmaw
effect: Transforms caster into a dragon to bite enemies before them.

name: Fia's Mist
effect: Release a mist of death before caster

name: Flame Sling
effect:
Produces and throws a ball of raging fire.
Charging up this incantation makes it more powerful and cases the ball to explode.

name: Frenzied Burst
effect:
Releases concentrated blasts of the yellow flame of frenzy from the caster's eyes.
Charging enhances potency, enabling the blasts to penetrate the enemy's guard.

name: Honed Bolt
effect:
Summons a bolt of lightning to strike foes from above.
This incantation can be cast repeatedly.

name: Inescapable Frenzy
effect: Latches onto foes to spread madness. This incantation also causes buildup of madness in the caster, and is only effective against Tarnished.

name: Magma Shot
effect: Fires a lump of magma that explodes on contact. Charging enhances potency.

name: Night Shard
effect:
Swiftly fires a semi-invisible
magic projectile

name: O Flame!
effect:
Momentarily sparks roaring flame from the caster's hand.
Charging enhances potency.

name: Oracle Bubbles
effect: Launches several small magic bubbles.

name: Poison Mist
effect:
Releases a poisonous mist before the caster.
This incantation can be cast while in motion.

name: Rancorcall
effect: Summons vengeful spirits that chase down foes. Charging enhances potency.

name: Rejection
effect:
Produces a shockwave that pushes away foes near the caster.
This incantation increases in power when charged up.

name: Rock Blaster
effect:
Imbues the ferrule of the caster's staff with magic, then thrusts it
into the ground to create a massive magical shockwave.Hold to continue moving without striking the ground, and then
push the end of the staff into enemies

name: Rock Sling
effect: Pulls a clumb of rocks from the earth and sends them flying. This sorcery can be cast while in motion.

name: Roiling Magma
effect:
Fires a lump of condensed magma that explodes a short delay after hitting the target.
Charging enhances potency and further delays the explosion.

name: Shatter Earth
effect:
Imbues the ferrule of the caster's staff with magic, then thrusts it into the ground to create a magical shockwave.
Allows one follow-up attack.

name: Starlight
effect:
Creates a small, floating star light that illuminates surroundings.
This sorcery can be cast while in motion.

name: Swarm of Flies
effect: Releases a swarm of bloodflies before the caster
